title: League Install Stuck at 0.0Mb/0.0Mb
body: Well my league client was having issues so i decided to uninstall it and install a new fresh copy. The installer does everything it needs to do and then a patcher opens which is says eta 0 mins and 0.0Mb/0.0Mb. Pls help have been trying to fix this for some time now

replies.body:
For folks having this issue, give the solutions in the [Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) support article a shot!

If that doesn't work, create a new thread and we'll try to get you a response asap!

Try this. Go to League's folder. Find lol.launcher.admin. Launch it and it will do some scanning. After some scanning orange "Launch" button will appear. Click it and login. Worked for me.

Edit: I had same problem today and fixed it this way. Hope this helps.
i cant even find the lol launcher admin idk why tho

> [{quoted}](name=Nightcäll,realm=EUW,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=hU6g6zrh,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-07T22:29:07.931+0000)
